title: ClashBookie
author: ClashBookie
content: Clash, built on Solana, is a token that will give you an odd boost advantage in our bookie compared to our competition. The bookie is currently being worked on and will release in the next month. The only way to get the tokens is through this airdrop. Airdrop Registration Form: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1ajGWn1VxbW_PId5atBhZDnWmIK3ZSgJJL2tMZ9q4RYE/viewform?pli=1&pli=1&edit_requested=trueLink To Tweet:  https://twitter.com/ClashBookie/status/1661535700750069762?s=20Website: https://www.betwithclash.com/Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/ClashBookieDiscord: https://discord.com/invite/z7tDW7VBCbABOUT THE AIRDROP:U.S Based40,000,000 tokens Our token will be airdropped. Distributed fairly to all of our participantsWe will be airdropping 2,000 $CSB tokens to every participant. LIMITED TO 10,000 PARTICIPANTS!100% of the tokens won by the bookie will be BURNED every 6 months (June 1st) (December 1st). Bookie will get 10,000,000 $CSB tokens, THIS AMOUNT WILL BE LOCKED and will be used to secure user payouts over time, and for exclusive offers for our users.Team will get 10,000,000. Any tokens sold by the team will be used to better the platform, enhance user experience, and to promote the brand----WHAT OUR BOOKIE OFFERSOnce $CSB is deposited into our bookie the asset turns into dollars. Keeping the value of your tokens stable.Up to 50% odd boosts on money-line bets while using our token compared to other bookiesSame game parlays, “odds boost aren’t affected in parlays”Give our Solana users a small odd boost from time to time, whilst encouraging $CSP token adoption for future bets. Solana won by the house will be converted into $CSB and burned.Fantasy betting, bet on individual players, ex. (Will they score? Will they assist?) up to 30% odds boost using our token compared to other bookies!PnL chart for user bets. Track your wins and losses with a personalized chart by our bookie!Swap Solana and USD for Clash on site with a 0% feeOur odds beat every bookie in existence!
